TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ComboBox extends System.Windows.Forms.ListControl

summary.span: 表示 Windows 组合框控件。

span.span: Represents a Windows combo box control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A显示一个文本框结合，从而使用户从列表中选择项或输入新值。A displays a text box combined with a , which enables the user to select items from the list or enter a new value. 属性指定是否始终显示的列表，或是否列表显示在下拉列表中。The property specifies whether the list is always displayed or whether the list is displayed in a drop-down. 属性还指定是否可以编辑的文本部分。The property also specifies whether the text portion can be edited. 请参阅用于可用的设置和其效果。See for the available settings and their effects. 没有可始终显示的列表，而不允许输入新值的设置。There is no setting to always display the list and disallow entering a new value. 若要显示可向其添加任何新值的列表，请使用控件。To display a list to which no new values can be added, use a control. 若要添加或删除列表中的对象，在运行时，使用的方法类 (通过属性)。To add or remove objects in the list at run time, use methods of the class (through the property of the ). 你可以分配的对象引用与数组方法。You can assign an array of object references with the method. 然后，该列表显示每个对象的默认字符串值。The list then displays the default string value for each object. 您可以添加与单个对象方法。You can add individual objects with the method. 您可以删除与项目方法或清除整个列表与方法。You can delete items with the method or clear the entire list with the method. 显示和选择功能，除了还提供功能，您可以有效地将项添加到并查找的项列表中的文本。In addition to display and selection functionality, the also provides features that enable you to efficiently add items to the and to find text within the items of the list. 与和的方法，你可以将添加大量的项到而无需每次都重新绘制控件项添加到列表。With the and methods, you can add a large number of items to the without the control being repainted each time an item is added to the list. 和方法使你能够搜索包含特定的搜索字符串的列表中的项。The and methods enable you to search for an item in the list that contains a specific search string. 你可以使用这些属性来管理在列表中，当前选定的项属性指定在编辑的字段中，显示的字符串属性来获取或设置当前的项，与属性来获取或设置引用的对象。You can use these properties to manage the currently selected item in the list, the property to specify the string displayed in the editing field, the property to get or set the current item, and the property to get or set a reference to the object. > [!NOTE] > 如果你有， ，或上基础 Windows 窗体页上，并且想要修改的派生窗体中的这些控件的字符串集合，该基窗体中的这些控件的字符串集合必须为空。If you have a , , or on a base Windows Forms page and want to modify the string collections of those controls in a derived form, the string collections of those controls in the base form must be empty. 如果不为空字符串集合，这些变为只读派生另一个窗体时。If the string collections are not empty, they become read-only when you derive another form. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个完整的应用程序，演示如何使用方法将项添加到、方法以查找中的项，和和方法有效地添加大量项到。The following code example is a complete application showing how you can use the method to add items to a , the method to find items in a , and the and methods to efficiently add a large number items to a . 能够存储不同于显示的文本的值继承自。The ability to store values that are different from displayed text is inherited from . 有关如何使用此功能的示例，请参阅类。For an example of how to use this feature, see the class. 你必须添加对引用`System.Drawing`和`System.Windows.Forms`要运行此示例的命名空间。You must add references to the `System.Drawing` and `System.Windows.Forms` namespaces to run this example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用， ，和属性以创建，通过比较输入于维护的源中的所有字符串的前缀的前缀来自动完成输入的字符串。Use the , , and properties to create a that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source. 这可用于在其中 Url、 地址、 文件名称或命令将经常输入的控件。This is useful for controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered. 如果在保留源中存在重复项，自动完成行为不可预知。If there are duplicate entries in the maintained source, automatic completion behaves unpredictably. 使用属性是可选的但您必须设置属性`CustomSource`才能使用。The use of the property is optional, but you must set the property to `CustomSource` in order to use . 必须使用和属性组合在一起。You must use the and properties together. > [!NOTE] > 操作系统可能会限制可以同时显示的自定义字符串的数量。The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that it can display at once. 字符串的包含正斜杠 （/） 或反斜杠 (\\)，自动完成追加仅达且包括斜杠的所有字符。For strings that contain a forward slash (/) or backward slash (\\), automatic completion appends all characters only up to and including the slash.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用， ，和属性以创建，通过比较输入于维护的源中的所有字符串的前缀的前缀来自动完成输入的字符串。Use the , , and properties to create a that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source. 这可用于在其中 Url、 地址、 文件名称或命令将经常输入的控件。This is useful for controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered. 如果在保留源中存在重复项，自动完成行为不可预知。If there are duplicate entries in the maintained source, automatic completion behaves unpredictably. 如果你设置到，该列表显示仅当是或。If you set to , the list displays only if is or . 使用属性是可选的但您必须设置属性才能使用。The use of the property is optional, but you must set the property to in order to use . 必须使用和属性组合在一起。You must use the and properties together. 与设置为和设置为，行为是，如下所示：With set to and set to , the behavior is as follows: - 如果的字符串的列表为空，按 BACKSPACE 或 DELETE 键不执行任何操作。If the list of strings is empty, pressing the BACKSPACE or DELETE key does nothing. - 如果小于一秒内按 BACKSPACE 键，选择以前的项目时，或未选择任何内容的字符串列表是否为空。If the BACKSPACE key is pressed in less than one second, the previous item is selected, or nothing is selected if the list of string is empty. - 如果在多个为一秒内按 BACKSPACE 键，选择第一个项。If the BACKSPACE key is pressed in more than one second, the first item is selected. - 如果按 DELETE 键，选择第一个项。If the DELETE key is pressed, the first item is selected. > [!NOTE] > 操作系统可能会限制可以同时显示的自定义字符串的数量。The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that it can display at once. 字符串的包含正斜杠 （/） 或反斜杠 (\\)，自动完成追加仅达且包括斜杠的所有字符。For strings that contain a forward slash (/) or backward slash (\\), automatic completion appends all characters only up to and including the slash.

span.span: Maintains performance when items are added to the one at a time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法阻止从之前的绘制控件调用方法。This method prevents the control from painting until the method is called. 将项添加到的首选的方式是使用方法类 (通过属性)。The preferred way to add items to the is to use the method of the class (through the property of the ). 这使您可以一次向列表添加项的数组。This enables you to add an array of items to the list at one time. 但是，如果你想要添加项时使用一个方法类，可以使用方法，以防止重新绘制控件每次向列表添加项。However, if you want to add items one at a time using the method of the class, you can use the method to prevent the control from repainting the each time an item is added to the list. 完成向列表添加项的任务后，请调用方法，以使重绘窗体。Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the method to enable the to repaint. 将项添加的这种方式可以避免闪烁期间的绘制大量的项添加到列表时。This way of adding items can prevent flicker during the drawing of the when a large number of items are being added to the list. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的使用情况和方法。The following code example shows the usage of the and methods. 此示例中的一个完整的代码示例摘自类概述。The example is part of a complete code example in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件由一个所有者绘制。This event is used by an owner-drawn . 你可以使用此事件来执行绘制项所需的任务。You can use this event to perform the tasks needed to draw items in the . 如果你有大小可变的项 (时属性设置为`OwnerDrawVariable`值)，在绘制某一项前,引发事件。If you have a variable sized item (when the property is set to the `OwnerDrawVariable` value of ), before drawing an item, the event is raised. 你可以创建的事件处理程序事件，以指定要绘制事件处理程序中的项的大小事件。You can create an event handler for the event to specify the size for the item that you are going to draw in your event handler for the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过设置中创建一个所有者描述的组合框属性`OwnerDrawnVariable`和处理和事件。The following code example demonstrates how to create an owner-drawn combo box by setting the property to `OwnerDrawnVariable` and handling the and events. 它还演示如何设置和属性。It also demonstrates setting the and properties. 若要运行该示例，请在窗体中粘贴以下代码。To run the example, paste the following code in a form. 调用`InitializeComboBox`窗体的构造函数中的方法或事件。Call the `InitializeComboBox` method in the form's constructor or event. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxOwnerDrawn#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxOwnerDrawn/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxOwnerDrawn#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxOwnerDrawn/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxOwnerDrawn#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxOwnerDrawn/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将项添加到的首选的方式是使用方法类 (通过属性)。The preferred way to add items to the is to use the method of the class (through the property of the ). 这使您可以一次向列表添加项的数组。This enables you to add an array of items to the list at one time. 但是，如果你想要添加项时使用一个方法类，可以使用方法，以防止重新绘制控件每次向列表添加项。However, if you want to add items one at a time using the method of the class, you can use the method to prevent the control from repainting the each time an item is added to the list. 完成向列表添加项的任务后，请调用方法，以使重绘窗体。Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the method to enable the to repaint. 这种方法添加项可以防止闪烁的绘制大量的项添加到列表时。This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the when a large number of items are being added to the list. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的使用情况和方法。The following code example shows the usage of the and methods. 此示例中的一个代码示例摘自类概述。The example is part of a code example in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法执行的搜索不区分大小写。The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive. `s`参数是要针对与组合框列表中的项关联的文本进行比较的子字符串。The `s` parameter is a substring to compare against the text associated with the items in the combo box list. 搜索执行部分匹配的开始处的文本，并在列表中符合指定的子字符串中返回的第一项。The search performs a partial match starting from the beginning of the text, and returning the first item in the list that matches the specified substring. 然后，你可以执行任务，删除包含搜索文本使用的项等方法或更改项的文本。You can then perform tasks, such as removing the item that contains the search text using the method or changing the item's text. 一旦你找到指定的文本，如果你想要搜索的文本中的其他实例，必须使用的版本指定内的起始索引为提供一个参数的方法。Once you have found the specified text, if you want to search for other instances of the text in the , you must use the version of the method that provides a parameter for specifying a starting index within the . 如果你想要执行搜索而不是部分匹配的确切的单词匹配，则使用方法。If you want to perform a search for an exact word match instead of a partial match, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的使用情况方法和属性。The following code example shows the usage of the method and property. 此示例中的一个完整的代码示例摘自类概述。The example is part of a complete code example in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法执行的搜索不区分大小写。The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive. `s`参数是要针对与组合框列表中的项关联的文本进行比较的子字符串。The `s` parameter is a substring to compare against the text associated with the items in the combo box list. 搜索执行部分匹配的开始处的文本，在列表中符合指定的子字符串中返回的第一项。The search performs a partial match starting from the beginning of the text, returning the first item in the list that matches the specified substring. 然后，你可以执行任务，删除包含搜索文本使用的项等方法或更改项的文本。You can then perform tasks, such as removing the item that contains the search text using the method or changing the item's text. 使用此方法的未指定起始索引版本建立调用之后，通常使用此方法。This method is typically used after a call has been made using the version of this method that does not specify a starting index. 在列表中找到的初始项后, 此方法通常用于通过指定中的索引位置查找进一步的搜索文本实例`startIndex`的搜索文本的第一个找到实例之后的项的参数。Once an initial item has been found in the list, this method is typically used to find further instances of the search text by specifying the index position in the `startIndex` parameter of the item after the first found instance of the search text. 如果你想要执行搜索而不是部分匹配的确切的单词匹配，则使用方法。If you want to perform a search for an exact word match instead of a partial match, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法执行的搜索不区分大小写。The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive. `s`参数是一个字符串，要针对与组合框列表中的项关联的文本进行比较。The `s` parameter is a string to compare against the text associated with the items in the combo box list. 搜索将查找匹配项的开始处的文本，在列表中符合指定的子字符串中返回的第一项。The search looks for a match starting from the beginning of the text, returning the first item in the list that matches the specified substring. 然后，你可以执行任务，删除包含搜索文本使用的项等方法或更改项的文本。You can then perform tasks, such as removing the item that contains the search text using the method or changing the item's text. 使用此方法的未指定起始索引版本建立调用之后，通常使用此方法。This method is typically used after a call has been made using the version of this method that does not specify a starting index. 在列表中找到的初始项后, 此方法通常用于通过指定中的索引位置查找进一步的搜索文本实例`startIndex`的搜索文本的第一个找到实例之后的项的参数。Once an initial item has been found in the list, this method is typically used to find further instances of the search text by specifying the index position in the `startIndex` parameter of the item after the first found instance of the search text. 如果你想要执行而不是确切的单词匹配的部分单词搜索，使用方法。If you want to perform partial word search instead of an exact word match, use the method. 此方法执行的搜索是循环。The search performed by this method is circular. 尽管搜索开始后的下一步索引`startIndex`参数，搜索后重启 0 时达到集合的末尾。Although the search starts at the next index after the `startIndex` parameter, the search restarts at 0 when the end of the collection is reached. 但是，请注意，如果`startIndex`参数本身等于集合中的最后一个索引，则会引发异常。However, note that if the `startIndex` parameter itself is equal to the last index in the collection, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化通过设置和属性，并使用方法可以搜索。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a control by setting the and properties and using the methods to search the . 它还说明如何处理事件。It also shows handling the event. summary.span: 获取或设置 的可编辑部分中选定的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is selected in the editable portion of a .

value.span: 表示组合框中当前选定文本的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the currently selected text in the combo box.

value.span: 如果 设置为 ，则返回值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: If is set to , the return value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用属性来检索或更改中当前选定的文本控件。You can use the property to retrieve or change the currently selected text in a control. 但是，应该注意，所选内容可能会更改自动由于用户交互。However, you should be aware that the selection can change automatically because of user interaction. 例如，如果你检索按钮中的值事件处理程序，值将为空字符串。For example, if you retrieve the value in a button event handler, the value will be an empty string. 这是因为在输入的焦点从组合框中移动到的按钮时，将自动清除所选内容。This is because the selection is automatically cleared when the input focus moves from the combo box to the button. 时组合框失去焦点时，则选择点移到文本的开头和任何所选的文本变为未选中状态。When the combo box loses focus, the selection point moves to the beginning of the text and any selected text becomes unselected. 在这种情况下，获取属性检索空字符串，并设置属性的文本的开头添加指定的值。In this case, getting the property retrieves an empty string, and setting the property adds the specified value to the beginning of the text. 在组合框获得焦点，是自动选择控件中的完整文本。When the combo box gains focus, the full text in the control is automatically selected. 如果调用控件的方法以设置输入的焦点的完整文本选择而不考虑控件是否已有焦点。If you call the control's method to set the input focus, the full text is selected regardless of whether the control already had focus. 当用户选择一个项，从下拉列表或通过使用向上键和向下箭头键时，自动选择新的项的文本。When the user selects an item from the drop-down list or by using the UP ARROW and DOWN ARROW keys, the text for the new item is automatically selected. 但是，如果你尝试获取中的值或事件处理程序，该属性返回一个空字符串。However, if you try to get the value in a or event handler, the property returns an empty string. 这是因为，在这些事件的时间的上一个清除值和新值尚未设置。This is because, at the time of these events, the previous value has been cleared and the new value has not yet been set. 若要检索中的当前值或事件处理程序中，使用属性改为。To retrieve the current value in a or event handler, use the property instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有当用户更改组合框选择，并可以创建提供对特殊处理此事件的处理程序时引发事件当用户更改列表中的选定的项。The event is raised only when the user changes the combo box selection, and you can create a handler for this event to provide special handling for the when the user changes the selected item in the list. 但是，具体取决于如何配置，以及用户如何更改所选的项目，可能不会引发事件。However, depending on how the is configured, and how the user changes the selected item, the event may not be raised. 或者，你可以处理，但是请注意，发生此事件，以编程方式或用户是否更改索引。Alternatively, you can handle the , but note that this event occurs whether the index is changed programmatically or by the user. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用事件和属性可以更改文本框中，具体取决于用户已选择并提交的长度。The following code example uses the event and the property to change the length of the text box depending on what the user has selected and committed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件中不选择任何文本，则此属性将指示新文本的插入点。If no text is selected in the control, this property indicates the insertion point for new text. 如果将此属性设置为控件中文本的长度超出位置，在选择开始位置位于最后一个字符之后。If you set this property to a location beyond the length of the text in the control, the selection start position is placed after the last character. 当文本框控件中选定文本时，更改此属性可以发布的值属性。When text is selected in the text box control, changing this property can release the value of the property. 如果位置之后控件中的剩余文本由属性小于的值属性、 的值属性会自动减小。If the remaining text in the control after the position indicated by the property is less than the value of the property, the value of the property is automatically decreased. 值属性永远不会导致增加属性。The value of the property never causes an increase in the property. > [!NOTE] > 返回当前所选内容的较小值。 returns the lower value of the current selection. 例如，`Select(10, -4)`从字符位置 6 字符位置 10 到选择的文本。For example, `Select(10, -4)` selects the text from character position 6 through character position 10. 如果您现在获得值，它将是 6，而不是 10。If you now get the value, it will be 6 rather than 10.

span.span: The value is less than zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定是否对现有条目进行排序并将新条目添加到列表中的相应排序位置。This property specifies whether the sorts existing entries and add new entries to the appropriate sorted position in the list. 你可以使用此属性进行自动排序中的项。You can use this property to automatically sort items in a . 将项目添加到一个经过排序，项目被移动到已排序的列表中的适当位置。As items are added to a sorted , the items are moved to the appropriate location in the sorted list. 将属性设置为`false`，新项添加到现有列表的末尾。When you set the property to `false`, new items are added to the end of the existing list. 排序是不区分大小写和按字母升序排序。The sort is case-insensitive and in alphabetically ascending order. 正在尝试设置上的数据绑定控件的属性会引发。Attempting to set the property on a data-bound control raises an . 必须对使用基础数据模型的数据进行排序。You must sort the data using the underlying data model.

summary.span: 处理 Windows 消息。

span.span: Processes Windows messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有消息都发送到方法通过进行筛选后的方法。All messages are sent to the method after getting filtered through the method. 方法与 Windows `WindowProc` 函数完全对应。The method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function. 有关处理 Windows 消息的详细信息，请参阅`WindowProc`Windows 平台 SDK 参考中的函数文档位于 MSDN 库http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information about processing Windows messages, see the `WindowProc` function documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法以处理操作系统消息中标识结构。The following code example demonstrates overriding the method to handle operating system messages identified in the structure. 在此示例中了解另一个应用程序变为活动状态，以便处理 WM_ACTIVATEAPP 操作系统消息。The WM_ACTIVATEAPP operating system message is handled in this example to know when another application is becoming active. 请参阅平台 SDK 文档参考位于 MSDN 库http://msdn.microsoft.com/library以了解可用， ，和值。Refer to the Platform SDK documentation reference located in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library to understand the available , , and values. 可以在 MSDN 库中也是可用平台 SDK （核心 SDK 部分） 下载中包含的 Windows.h 标头文件中找到实际的常量值http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。Actual constant values can be found in the Windows.h header file included in the Platform SDK (Core SDK section) download, which is also available in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/VB/form1.vb#1)]

permission.span: 用于继承类调用非托管的代码。

span.span: for inheriting classes to call unmanaged code.
Associated enumeration: .

para.span: 继承控件应调用基类的方法来处理它们不处理任何消息。

span.span: Inheriting controls should call the base class's method to process any messages that they do not handle.
